missionProperties.startingObjective: Defeat Imperial figures and search their remains to find the keycard.
missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure carrying the keycard can open doors.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent remains. After an Imperial figure is defeated, place the remains in its space. A Rebel figure can interact with the remains to search them for the keycard. Use the "control room" (separate part of the map) to interact with the mission tokens.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent spice barreis. A healthy hero or <color="red">Chewbacca</color> can interact with a spice barrel ({K}) to claim the token.
{-} The heroes win when all of the spice barrels have been claimed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and <color="red">Chewbacca</color> is defeated.

changeRepositionOverride.theText: Block access to the spice barrels.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

entityProperties.name: Crate1
entityProperties.theText: An old supply crate.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
A Weequay stands guard in the alley outside the storehouse, confirming that you're at the right place. As you walk up, he glares, placing a hand on his blaster.

With a roar, Chewbacca charges forward. He seizes the surprised guard and slams him in to the door, over and over, until it smashes inward.

Dropping the unconscious and battered Weequay, he steps inside, and you follow.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Place 1 neutral mission token under each <color="red">Trandoshan Hunter</color> and under the Probe Droid.
{-} Deploy <color="red">Chewbacca</color> (Loyal Wookiee) to the red highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure carrying the keycard can open doors.
{-} Neutral mission tokens represent remains. After an Imperial figure is defeated, place the remains in its space. A Rebel figure can interact with the remains to search them for the keycard. Use the "control room" (separate part of the map) to interact with the mission tokens.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent spice barreis. A healthy hero or <color="red">Chewbacca</color> can interact with a spice barrel ({K}) to claim the token.
{-} The heroes win when all of the spice barrels have been claimed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and <color="red">Chewbacca</color> is defeated.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
After blasting your way clear and hauling the stolen spice out, Chewbacca thanks you far your help. He quickly assures you that, should you need the assistance, he would be more than happy to help you in return.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive <color="red">Chewbacca</color> (Loyal Wookiee) as an ally.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose round limit
globalEvents.eventText:
The Hutt had his spice guarded well; the resistance you encountered is simply too much. Your attempted theft will keep the Hutts busy and paranoid far a little while, but significantly less than if you'd succeeded.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose defeat
globalEvents.eventText:
The Hutt had his spice guarded well; the resistance you encountered is simply too much. Your attempted theft will keep the Hutts busy and paranoid far a little while, but significantly less than if you'd succeeded.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: Search Remains 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You search through the remains, but find nothing of interest.

Discard this token.

entityProperties.name: Remains 1
entityProperties.theText:
When a <color="red">Trandoshan Hunter</color> or the Probe Droid is defeated, place a neutral mission token in his space. The token represents the figure's remains.

A Rebel figure can interact with remains to search them for the keycard. To do so, click "Search remains" on any available mission token.

globalEvents.name: Search Remains 2
globalEvents.eventText:
You search through the remains, but find nothing of interest.

Discard this token.

entityProperties.name: Remains 2
entityProperties.theText:
When a <color="red">Trandoshan Hunter</color> or the Probe Droid is defeated, place a neutral mission token in his space. The token represents the figure's remains.

A Rebel figure can interact with remains to search them for the keycard. To do so, click "Search remains" on any available mission token.

globalEvents.name: Search Remains 3
globalEvents.eventText:
You search through the remains, and finally find what you are looking for: the keycard.

{-} Claim this token. You are carrying the keycard.

entityProperties.name: Remains 3
entityProperties.theText:

A Rebel figure can interact with remains to search them for the keycard. To do so, click "Search remains" on any available mission token.

globalEvents.eventText:

Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Doors unlock
globalEvents.eventText: Now that you have found the keycard, you can gain access to the Spice Room.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure carrying the keycard can open doors.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent spice barreis. A healthy hero or <color="red">Chewbacca</color> can interact with a spice barrel ({K}) to claim the token.
{-} The heroes win when all of the spice barrels have been claimed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded and <color="red">Chewbacca</color> is defeated.
Open the door to the Spice Room.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
entityProperties.theText: This door is locked. A Rebel figure carrying the keycard can open it.

entityProperties.name: Door 2
entityProperties.theText: This door is locked. A Rebel figure carrying the keycard can open it.

globalEvents.name: Defend the Spice 1
globalEvents.eventText: Picking up the keycard appears to have triggered some sort of alarm.

globalEvents.name: Defend the Spice 2
globalEvents.eventText:
Seeing that their spice stocks are in danger, your enemies double their efforts.

{-} The Imperial figure with the highest cost that can attack interrupts to attack {rebel}.

globalEvents.name: The Back Room
globalEvents.eventText: You're immediately assaulted by the stinging aroma of spice. A blaster emplacement swivels toward you, a last line of defense to protect the greater portions of the stash.

entityProperties.name: Door 1
